main.name: Yash Gupta
main.description: Upcoming React Front End Developer. Always eager to learn, grow and Connect.
main.bio: Hi! I am Yash. I'm a recent graduate looking for full time opportunities in the domain of Front End Development using React Js.
main.contactmessage: Let's connect for further details. Share knowledge and experiences.

resume.skillmessage: ReactJs, Firebase: Authentication/ Storage/ Real-time databases, HTML, CSS, Python, Machine Learning and Deep Learning.

testimonials.text: Yash and I were classmates in engineering and I have had the pleasure of working with him in several group projects.He is a wonderful team player and his spirit of responsibility made him play a crucial role in every project we took up. He is truly stalwart and one can always bank on him to get the job done. He strives for perfection in the work he takes up and loves to make things as organized as possible. Be it Web Development or Machine Learning. He is always up for trying something new.
